mapper.update: CREATE TABLE ${table}_mod${remainder} PARTITION OF ${table} FOR VALUES WITH (modulus ${modulus}, remainder ${remainder});
CREATE TABLE ${table}_${key} ( id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, id2 TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE )
CREATE SEQUENCE IF NOT EXISTS ${table}_${key}_id_seq START 1
SELECT setval('${table}_${key}_id_seq', (SELECT COALESCE(max(id),1) AS id FROM ${table} WHERE dataset_key = #{key}))
ALTER TABLE ${table} ATTACH PARTITION ${table}_${key} FOR VALUES IN ( ${key} )
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS ${table}_${key} CASCADE; DROP SEQUENCE IF EXISTS ${table}_${key}_id_seq;
